has labelled Christina Aguilera 's performance at the Super Bowl as`` bad''. The singer fluffed her words whilst performing The Star-Spangled Banner at one of America's biggest sporting events. Simon Cowell said: It sounded like 100,000 people in a stadium had just sat on a cat. He went on to say:`` I always say this, this is what happens when you perform in front of an audience- even someone as experienced as Christina Aguilera . You can get it wrong.

Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web,'' he said.
